text: Portrait of Hōjō Genan was a Japanese Samurai of the Sengoku period. He was third son of Hōjō Sōun. Genan was highly educated samurai thus he worked as a diplomat of the Later Hōjō clan. His son Hōjō Ujinobu was attacked by the Takeda clan`s large army and forced to kill himself during the Siege of Kanbara in 1569. ==References== Category:1493 births Category:1589 deaths Category:Go-Hōjō clan
title: Hōjō Genan
